name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Frieren: Magic and Adventure in a Live Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in Frierenâ€™s magical journey with captivating visuals and handy shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embark on a magical journey with Frieren in this dynamic theme featuring sleek design and quick shortcuts.
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Frieren with stunning visuals inspired by her adventures.
Minimalist Design: A clean and serene interface reflecting the beauty and magic of Frieren's story.
Clock and Date: Keep track of time and date at a glance while exploring the Frieren universe.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Instantly navigate to your favorite websites with ease.
Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with the engine selected by the user.
More Extension: Add unique features to enhance your browsing experience with a touch of magic and wonder.
